meta.article_title: February 17, 2020 - Footwork: Wide Stance and Two-Step?

debutant.description: Left leg slightly forward, knees bent, weight on the inside balls of the feet, relaxed.

intermediaire.description: Pull with the left leg, then shuffle both feet together, almost a jumping motion except your feet almost brush across the floor.

avance.description: As you step around, rotate your shoulders so that you end up with your shoulders at least parallel to the direction you are going to hit. Pull the playing arm back as you step around.
